title: Trump is said to believe that the Democrats will never impeach him
text:
Citing several people who have spoken with him on the matter, the Post reported that Trump told friends he believes that Democrats are “divided and somewhat scattered about how to proceed in their impeachment inquiry.”

He has also said that Democrats could “fumble” the probe, and might not even bring an impeachment vote to the House floor, two Trump advisers briefed on discussions but not authorized to talk to the media told the publication.

They added that aides have gently told the president that he is likely wrong, and that House Speaker Nancy Pelosi is determined to see through impeachment through.
